attributes.action: prevent bonuses or over-inflation salary increases being paid to employees of banks where the government now has a majority shareholding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should use its power as a majority shareholder to prevent banks in receipt of government (taxpayer) funding from paying bonuses and over inflation salary increases to employees. A total ban on bonus payments should be made  a condition of any government loan or bail-out.
